function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited access to services and facilities due to lockdown measures","Impact":"Decreased physical activity and increased reliance on local green spaces","Mitigation":"Implement outdoor activity programs within local green spaces","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms for organizing outdoor activities","People":"People in lockdown areas","Owner":"Local community organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of proximity to green space in residential areas","Impact":"Reduced physical activity and negative impact on health and well-being","Mitigation":"Incorporate green space in urban planning and design","Technologies":"Green space mapping and analysis tools","People":"Residents of urban areas","Owner":"Urban planners and designers"}]}
